players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob’s death is tragic, but we need to stay focused. I think we should watch Diana closely—her silence makes me uneasy. What do you all think?"
You: "I agree we need to watch everyone, not just Diana. Charlie, why single her out so quickly when we have no information yet?"
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Charlie, Diana has made a serious accusation. What is your response to her claim that you are the mafioso?"
Diana: "Alice, trust me. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed Charlie is mafia. We must vote him out now to win."
Charlie: "Accusations without proof don't win the game. Diana, if you're the detective, why reveal your info so quickly? It makes me question your strategy and motives."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
